name: Dubai Miracle Garden
description: Miracle Garden is one of a kind in the region and in the world for such a unique display and extravagant outdoor recreational destination. Miracle Garden in its first phase is providing state-of-the-art services and facilities including open parking, VIP parking, sitting areas, prayer room, toilet blocks, ablution facility, security room, first aid room, carts for handicapped visitors, retails and commercial kiosk and all other related services available to facilitate visitors.

top_reviews.title: Great trip
top_reviews.review: Visited miracle garden and the work that has gone into this place is amazing. The detail into the flower displays were unique. Loved the different themes. Great place to take memorable pics. Definitely would recommend visitors to get down to miracle garden. A few hours is needed.

top_reviews.title: Don't forget your camera
top_reviews.review: Visited with my daughter. Lovely hour walking round. The gardeners must work round the clock as everything looked well maintained. A lovely time, and great photo opportunities.

top_reviews.title: Seasonal Display of Flowers
top_reviews.review: The garden opens only on seasonal basis. But once ready it is quite impressive. Donât expect tulips however. Time to visit is better either early morning or late afternoon with humidity a little lesser. Good for photo ops. Several food stalls and shops on standby. A little further away from the city center.

top_reviews.title: A unique experience
top_reviews.review: If you like the look and smell of living flowers then a visit to Miracle Gardens is a must do! Allow a couple of hours or more to see what the gardeners achieve literally overnight, every night. A unique and unforgettable experience reasonably priced within easy taxi distance of the local hotels in Dubai.

top_reviews.title: must visit
top_reviews.review: what an amazing place to visit, but i believe they have a staffing problem. we started to line up from 08:45 but we were told they had an electricity problem and we ended up entering the garden at 09:30. only ONE gate had the electricity problem and they could have easily directed us to the other gates which they didn't. on approaching the window to get the ticket, the operator basically shouted at me saying "rain , no refund" and it wasn't raining !!!!

top_reviews.title: Very good garden would recommend- be careful of taxis outside
top_reviews.review: I didnât see any ads or photos beforehand but I like gardens and flowers etc, I hate gardening but like pretty things, tickets were reasonable about Â£20 each. I thought it was brilliant. Very vivid, grand, dramatic, interesting, plenty to see. Shops to compliment on the outside, not too pushy sales people either. Loads of food huts and buses seating areas. Really enjoyed it, would recommend. TAXI WARNING: Taxis outside, some are not even taxis just men with cars. They told us the 50 dirham journey we had to get there was now 425 dirham due to rush hourâ¦. There was no rush hour. I got to 5 cars and was told each time it would be 150 minimum. In the end I decided to walk the 11 miles as I knew I was being fleeced. At that point they took me for 100. So it had gone from 425 to 100. Needless to say we got back quick in no traffic and it was no different to my proper taxi on the way there which cost only 50!

top_reviews.title: More flowers in one place than anywhere else
top_reviews.review: This garden was absolutely amazing, it had so many flowers, and it reminded me of Alice in the Wonderland with the castle and palace like structures and all the heart shaped motifs. The huge Emirates plan covered in flowers was also great. It is extremely crowded and very difficult to get a taxi to leave, which is a downside. There are a few food stalls selling junk food, fruit juices and coffee. It is 5 minutes walk from the butterfly garden so itâs good to see both on the same day.

top_reviews.title: A Garden Like No Other
top_reviews.review: This was quite the place and aptly named. We have visited many gardens around the world. This one was very different than most. Massive amounts of flowers decorate large-scale displays. In typical Dubai fashion, they even do their flowers up on a grand scale! The location had huge flower arches, a castle, a Smurf village, an Emirates plane, etc. It just went on and on. Pretty incredible to see. The grounds were very clean and they offered food stands around the perimeter and shaded areas with tables to sit down and eat. It was over the top but you get used to that in Dubai. We found it quite interesting and enjoyable. Good for a nice walk with interesting visuals. Just be prepared for the incredible number of people having to take picture after picture of themselves in front of everything.

top_reviews.title: Beautiful
top_reviews.review: Dubai don't do things by halves, this is an absolutely phenomenal experience. Lots to see and opportunity to capture pictures. We didn't do a tour, we just grabbed cab that dropped us off at the front and the driver advised that there is a butterfly garden nearby. Similarly, when leaving there are plenty of cabs outside that are ready to pick you up. Inside there are a lot of shaded areas so you don't need to worry about it being too hot to enjoy and it is definitely a comfortable experience. Also there are plentiful areas for refreshments too. There is a small area that the local market traders try to get you to visit their shops but they are respectful when you say "no thank you" so it isn't too overwhelming and actually feels pleasant.

top_reviews.title: Beautiful and artistic but crowds can make it less exciting and you can do the whole thing in an hour and a half
top_reviews.review: Its very pretty, Dubai is a great place to travel with young kids so they would enjoy it especially. Its gorgeous but our tour organisers had said we would want to spend 2-3hours in miracle garden. I requested a change in the itinerary last minute and Im glad I did. You should spend 1 and a half hour max here. But its subjective to the person, some people can spend an hour trying to get a good instagram shot. I also wasn't interested in the smurf sections so that cut down time for me. In a busy period you just want to see everything, snap some pretty pics and go somewhere else.

top_reviews.title: A blessing .
top_reviews.review: A blessing to visit this Gurdwara , more so that the Sikhism faith is honoured and recognised in Dubai allowing Sikhism to grow strength to strength without restrictions. A beautiful building , spaciousness in all areas from langar hall to darbar. Very clean , well maintained and open to all visitorâs.

top_reviews.title: Suddenly, India, and a relaxing atmosphere
top_reviews.review: You want to switch to another mood from Dubai? Head straight to this Sikh temple! Though clearly the only non Indians, we were very well welcomed, after washing hands and wearing some sort of bandana... Temple is so relaxing and bringing inner peace. Just sitting for a while was like recharging batteries. When leaving the temple, no taxis in sight, but again the Indians there were so helpful, and indeed a bus from the community drove all of us without a car to the near Ibn Battuta mall - free of charge mind you. Thanks to all the people behind this, bless them all.

top_reviews.title: Waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji waheguru ji
top_reviews.review: Waheguru ji waheguru ji It's really really heaven in the earth ð Waheguru ji blessings us. This Guru's house is for everyone, anyone can go and eat food, langar is served three times, tea is served all day. Waheguru Ji, keep your blessings on everyone like this waheguru ji ka Khalsa waheguru ji ki fathe .. Satnam Shri waheguru ji

top_reviews.title: A beautiful, spiritually uplifting centre welcome to all
top_reviews.review: What a beautiful, spiritually uplifting experience. Extremely peaceful and a feeling of serenity. Welcoming to all faiths and types. Slow and respectful entry with the ability to carefully enter the prayer hall and offer prayers. Beautiful surroundings, intricately designed and maintained. The ability for all to have langar in the dining area with the only requirement not to waste any food. A lovely ethos and opportunity to mix with those of different faiths. The Gurudwara is easily accessible, adjacent to the Hindu Temple and opposite a church.

name: Dubai Crocodile Park
description: Explore The Fascinating World Of Crocodiles. Home to 250 Nile Crocodiles, Dubai Crocodile Park offers a family friendly experience. The park includes a Natural History Museum, an African lake themed aquarium, a Savanna inspired landscaped area, a curio shop and multiple dining outlets.

top_reviews.title: Crocodile experience for 2
top_reviews.review: Really good experience, the staff were very welcoming and showed us and explained everything, it almost feels like you are getting a private tour of the complex. Definitely value for your money compared to other comparable experiences in the area such as the aquariums. Nice balance of aircon to outdoors area too and worth recommending to go just before 4:30 as this is feeding time for the crocodiles. You probably only need 1hr 30min. But worth every penny!

top_reviews.title: Great family experience
top_reviews.review: Great Crocodile park and aquarium! Took the kids (5 years and 15 years) all loved it so great for all ages. Museum is also a good learning experience for everyone. Our tour guide spent 1hr with us (no extra cost) and gave us loads of insight into the individual crocs. You can see fully grown 26 year old crocs, child crocs (in aquarium) and baby crocs under 1yrs in the medium. Will be going back.

top_reviews.title: A must for families and people who love animals
top_reviews.review: The park is very beautiful and considered a fun outing for family with kids. I enjoyed learning new and interesting facts about these fascinating creatures. The park offers two lovely restaurants to be opened during winter season, and a special crocodile encounter where you get to touch a crocodile, and an aquarium full of crocodiles swimming and enjoying their time under water. The place is well managed and well kept and offers an informative tour inside the museum if Iâm not mistaken shedding light on their historical existence and remains.

top_reviews.title: Brilliant and new must do in Dubai
top_reviews.review: Very good experience and very well presented if you want to get close to crocs. Mustafa gave us a guided tour and was very engaging, informative and great with the kids. For a relaxed visit with time in the museum plan for just over an hour with more if you fancy a bite to eat or arrive at feeding time. I will definitely be bringing people back to visit.

top_reviews.title: Dubai Crocodile Park review
top_reviews.review: Amazing experience from start to finish. Really quirky thing to do whilst in Dubai and much value for money vs other things I have done here. Really helpful staff that enjoy what they do. Baby crocodile encounter was a nice touch and the feeding was really interesting to see the crocs in action. Would highly recommend new experience and well worth every penny. Thanks to all the staff for making it well worth it

top_reviews.title: Definitely worth a visit
top_reviews.review: Itâs a lovely new place in Dubai. The guides were extremely friendly and knowledgeable, we learnt so many interesting things about crocodiles. Went with 2 teenagers and a 6-year old who all loved it. I cannot thank the staff enough for this great experience

top_reviews.title: Wonderful Experience
top_reviews.review: Amazing place for crocodile lovers. Great customer service from all the staffs from the reception to the curio shop to the museum to the aquarium and to the park. Loved it. Recommended place to visit while in Dubai. From kids to adults, everyone will love the experience.

top_reviews.title: Must visit
top_reviews.review: This place is amazing and a complete contrast to Dubaiâs rush. The employees are very friendly. The guides took a lot of time for explaining everything. The crocodiles seem very relaxed which is a good indicator for their treatment.

top_reviews.title: Worth the trip, and awesome staff, facilities, and experience!
top_reviews.review: This was much better than expected! There are over 200 crocodiles here of all ages/sizes, and the facilities are high quality. The caretakers and staff were very friendly, and they also fed us so much information about the history and life of crocodiles. One staff member held a Q/A session with us while another member gave us a full tour of the museum (at no extra costs). We went in the evening when it was not too warm and also not too busy. You can tell that a lot of thought and care was used to build this facility. Initially we thought the 80dhs was an expensive ticket, but after the experience, we can say it was well spent. You can spend a lot more in Dubai and get a lot less :-D

top_reviews.title: Great place, wish more people knew about it
top_reviews.review: The crocodiles were so many, it looked very serene and the staff was exceptionally helpful and friendly and well educated on their jobs, we had so much fun here! Iâm sure this place will grow so popular very soon, try to catch it before it becomes that way so youd enjoy the peaceful vibes and uninterrupted guidance from the staff. Highly recommended!

name: Burj Al Arab
description: One of the tallest hotels in the world, the unique white sail shape of this luxury hotel on Jumeirah Beach is iconic to Dubai's skyline.

top_reviews.title: Too class service in Jumeriah
top_reviews.review: We have a wonderful wonderful time in Dubai. Top class service with very kind people, yesterday after inside Burj Al Arab tour, weâre not sure how to get to Shimmers, the guy in the pic take us there and introduce Jumeirah Hotels to us, we have a very pleasant chat, and we have a really good memories here. Definitely will try Jumeriah resorts next time!

top_reviews.title: Beautiful building
top_reviews.review: This is a beautiful hotel and as you would expect nothing has been spared on decor. It's iconic and luxurious and if you feel like splashing out go for lunch. Guests get the benefit of seeing this area during the day and for those with children there is the huge Waterpark close by

top_reviews.title: An incredible and exceptional stay
top_reviews.review: Although I have visited the Burj Al Arab several times, this is the first time i stayed albeit for two nights. I can say it certainly was an experience being very grand and quite overwhelming at times. Their E Butler service is fantastic, all of the staff are amazing and the breakfast might be one of the best we have ever had...they also catered for my grandson who has allergies. This hotel astounded us with its exceptional touches such as 'happy hour' in our rooms to Hermes toiletries and access to Wild Wadi Water Park. It was an incredible experience, thoroughly enjoyed by all.

top_reviews.title: Luxurious stay
top_reviews.review: we stayed September for our wedding anniversary from the moment you step out of the limousine you are treated like royalty. the attention to detail is amazing. we arrived early and had a drink in the lobby bar Amazing! the butler took us to our room and showed us round every thing about the place just shouted luxury. gold plated just about very thing they could. all rooms are duplexes and downstairs is a wash room and toilet, tea coffee facilities by the entrance desk along side the mini bar which wasn't so mini. dining table and sofa's laid out on the spacious living level with floor to ceiling windows looking out to the Arabian sea. Going up the sweeping staircase to the wardrobes and dressing area, even a gold plated Dyson hairdryer! to the left was a spacious bathroom with jacuzzi bath double sink with his and hers Hermes toiletries including aftershave and perfume. extremely large shower cubicle with jets coming from all directions. across the hallway was the bedroom with seating area and again floor to ceiling windows overlooking the Arabian sea everything was remote controlled to the TV coming up from behind the drinks cabinet at the foot of the bed to the curtains being drawn but with a view that we had never shut the curtains. We had cocktails/ drinks served at our room prior to dinner with canapes absolutely delicious! the whole place was just opulent and did not want to leave. definitely stay again.

top_reviews.title: Loved the tour and the drinks
top_reviews.review: On day one we took the Big Bus tour to the stop for Burj Al Arab. We were disappointed we couldn't walk into the building, but I totally understand, given the crazy number of people there trying to get pictures. We decided to pay for the tour, then we were told my husband couldn't get in because he was in flip flops. I had read that online and totally forgot. The next day we came back dressed appropriately. The tour was great but our favorite part was relaxing at the beautiful outdoor bar after. We had been on tour after tour for two days and were exhausted. The view, drinks and service were just what we needed.

top_reviews.title: Guided tours inside are a must do
top_reviews.review: I think the most iconic building of Dubai (yes more than Burj Khalifa) as it is such a striking and unique structure. I was a little surprised that you can see it from roads nearby poking up from the office buildings and cars as I thought it was on a man-made island a bit off shore - but it is actually very close. I was able to go to the Jumeirah Beach hotel and take photos from their pool and walk on the beach area for close ups - nobody stopped me although not staying there. I think the guided tour inside is also well worth doing as we all know what it looks like from the outside but few see the decor inside. I note that the foundations have been laid nearby for Burj Al Arab 2 which are 3 times that of this original hotel. In my opinion the new one will spoil the views as less can be more. Glad I visited before the building overcrowding happens...

top_reviews.title: Amazing trip
top_reviews.review: Amazing place to visit. It is absolutely amazing to think it was built in the shape of a sail it stands out for miles. We took a boat ride around the harbour to start with to see how beautiful it was, and then we decided we would actually visit and we were so glad that we did the Kings room and the Queens room are beautiful. The fabrics that they used and the silk that they put on the walls to represent fire Stunning cashmere carpets gold staircase. The staff were extremely friendly. It was well organised. I was with two other friends and we sat we had some drinks and we just took in the view to me. This is a must itâs a seven star it is a hotel on a few floors are dread to think the cost, but to be honest, it was well worth the fee to get in. You could choose once youâve got there to upgrade which we did and if you have a drink you can then sit in the lounge for as long as you want. They give you a complimentary fruit which is Dates. The dates in England donât taste anywhere near the beautiful Dates I have there I asked for seconds, the staff are amazing theyâre willing informed have lots of information will take your photo if you ask him and I would recommend this visit really I would

top_reviews.title: A box ticked.
top_reviews.review: This is an excellent property with unparalleled location. The suites have great views and great butler service. Special mention is for our butler Tareq who made our stay very comfortable and did not make us feel the pressure of staying in a 7 star property. Food and beverages in restaurants were not as pricey as I was expecting.

top_reviews.title: Inside the Burj
top_reviews.review: How special it is to be able to visit the tour "Inside the Burj al Arab". Otherwise, you won't get into this 7 * hotel just like that, of course. After being welcomed in a sort of lobby, we were told what the tour was about. After walking through the.lobby we were taken by lift to the 25th floor. There we were shown how the hotel came into being and were able to walk through the museum and ask questions. After a date and coffee, we were picked up to go to the presidential suite and,..... What luxury. If you want to experience this when you are in Dubai definitely go for it

top_reviews.title: Five Stars because of Omar
top_reviews.review: The Burj is absolutely beautiful. The service was good Was good with the exception of our Butler Omar. He was absolutely fantastic!!! He went above and beyond and made our experience so much better. To be honest, my friend was a little upset about the service on our first night given the price of the Burj, but the next day we met Omar, and he totally turned our opinion around. He provided the type of luxury service that one would associate with the Burj. I also must give a shout out to the waiter we had for our tea service cannot remember his name, but he was fantastic as well. All in all it was a very nice experience and Iâm glad we stayed there.

name: Kite Beach
description: Kite Beach features open stretches of soft white sand, vibrant sights and sounds, fitness areas, a beach library, and kids activities, so all you have to do is sit back and relax.

top_reviews.title: Nice beach â±ï¸ to
top_reviews.review: Sand beach with thin water in egde, got alot of opportunity of foods and drinks but also place for shower. Have also parking options but unsure about payment , could have 2h free for guest but we could not get it . Otherwise 10AED per hour. You are nearby Burj Arab.

top_reviews.title: Nice
top_reviews.review: Very nice place and its free. Its an open beach for everyone. And they have also some shops and restaurants to eat there as well. You can enjoy swimming all day long, but they will not allow to swim like around 6pm.

top_reviews.title: Beautiful Beach
top_reviews.review: Absolutely beautiful beach. Very well maintained and very clean. Lots of food and drink options available (Starbucks, Cinnabon, etc). Lovely beach huts selling clothing, bags and jewellry. Changing & Shower Rooms available. We opted for the beach day pass at 120aed each. Beach towels, sun lounger and parasol included. Staff brilliant. Extremely impressed. My teenage daughter really loved it. Cycle track and walking track too.

top_reviews.title: Lovely beach
top_reviews.review: The beach is a must visit in Dubai. This is a huge wide stretch of beach and Kite Beach is a hub of restaurants and activities, including volleyball, padel tennis and more. You can take your own sun seats or pay to hotel sun beds. There is a bike track, walking track and the sea is generally very lovely and calm.

top_reviews.title: Lots to see and do at Kite Beach
top_reviews.review: this is a beautiful area in Dubai with plenty to do on the beach. Lots of food trucks and small restaurant type options to eat. There are many activities on the beach as well as a skate park and trampolines. Walk along the track for miles day and night .Beautiful sea views and views of the Burj Al Arab.

top_reviews.title: Family trip to Kite beach
top_reviews.review: Famous Kite beach! It is very popular and does get crowded, but not so much to ruin the experience. Great views of iconic Dubai buildings and a lovely sandy beach. Life guards on duty and loads of facilities, shops, and places to eat. Only negative is that the shower, toilet and changing facilities could improve.

top_reviews.title: Nice clean beach with Burj Al Arab views
top_reviews.review: This was Day 5 of my Dubai Trip and we started by visiting beach in the morning. I didnât have much expectations but I was surprised with the clear and pristine waters, less crowd and Burj Al Arab views. We didnât have much time to spend here and also it was a bit hot but I liked this beach.

top_reviews.title: Great beach to relax
top_reviews.review: Great beach to relax while in Dubai. It is a huge beach and you dont feel the cramped. After winter time till july, sea temparatures are quite nice. During and post summer, water is too warm for my liking.

top_reviews.title: The best days on the Kite Beach
top_reviews.review: It was my 4th vacation in Dubai. Iâve spent amazing time on the Kite beach with friends. This location is easy to reach by bus (you can take it from the bus station near the Mall of Emirates) and taxi. There are various cafes to eat with a sea view. This beach has some changing rooms, toilets and showers. I advise you to rent a bicycle and take a ride. Also, you can find other sports activities.

top_reviews.title: Be under no illusion that Dubai beaches are not a patch on natural European beaches
top_reviews.review: If youâre reading this you are either already in Dubai or considering visiting Dubaiâ¦ Be under no illusion that Dubai beaches are not a patch on natural European beaches, no matter how much faking they do. Taking that into account Kite beach is certainly one of the better beaches in Dubai, with no high rises, clean toilet, shower & changing facilities along with a variety of pop up eateries. Beach is clean and we found the water to be slightly cooler here than it is at JBR beach for example. life guards on duty.

name: Children's City
description: Dubai-based Children's City is the first educational city in the United Arab Emirates devoted to children between two and fifteen years old where they can investigate, explore, play, discover, and learn about the world in which we live. The Children's City is specially designed for children to interact and discover together in family and school groups. It contains several exhibits and programs like a nature center, space exploration, human body, planetarium, the way we live and international culture as well as toddlers area. In addition, Children's City presents daily educational workshops throughout the year at the different galleries or in the purpose-built halls and entertainment programs at the Children's City Theater for school students, children and families.

top_reviews.title: School Trip
top_reviews.review: We went from school as a educational trip during the space week. The price was worth it, and the trips that they went on were really fun and educational. Students had great time, specially the laser show, puppet show and the the planetarium show. I would definitely recommend to other school. Great educational experience.

top_reviews.title: Ø²ÙØ§Ø±Ù ÙØ¹Ø§ÙÙÙ ÙØ¯ÙÙØ© Ø§ÙØ·ÙÙ Ø¯Ø¨Ù
top_reviews.review: âToday, I visit creek Park. I am surprised by the beautiful event for children Future entrepreneur, organized by Childrenâs City. Next year, I will participate with my children to sell their products and handmade creations.

top_reviews.title: Wonderful place for children
top_reviews.review: It was lovely to see my little explorers enjoying in the play area and discovering the educational facilities like human body and space exploration. My daughter was happy for selling her handmade accessories by participating in the event of future entrepreneur. Your exceptional talent in organizing such a successful event is greatly appreciated. Thank you for an unforgettable experience.

top_reviews.title: Excellent Staff & Excellent Place
top_reviews.review: Great experience. Went last Minute with my 3 daughters and they loved it. The face painting ladies were able to do all 3 girls at the same time since they had 3 face painters on staff. The information lady from Karla was so very friendly. The entrance guards were even friendly. The lady at the play area opened the area up for our 3@4 year old even though the area was closed off (prior to the end time of the museum). My only suggestion would be to keep everything open and turned on until exactly the closing time, and not be turning things off prior to the closing time.

top_reviews.title: Amazing
top_reviews.review: I am so happy that I visited this place with my four kids. There was a play area for small kids like 3 or 4 years old or limited height of 110. And for my big kids they did workshops. There was planet shows which they enjoyed and all the galleries are like interactive. Worth for money and will visit again

top_reviews.title: Fun place for kids! Recommend 100%!
top_reviews.review: Amazing place for kids and family! The stuff is very friendly and helpful:) Definitely recommend to take your kids to the beautiful Creek park and Children city, and you can spend a whole day here. My son loves this place! Lots of things to do, not just educational but also something fun for kids, especially my sonâs favorite place is the soft play area where is available for kids under 110cm height.

top_reviews.title: Thanks to Stefi we had an amazing experience at the Al Ajyal theatre !
top_reviews.review: Yesterday we held our Annual function in the Al ajyal theater in the children's city Everything was so well organized . There team was so supportive a Thank you for the exceptional support and opportunity you and your team have provided to local dance groups like ours. I'm especially grateful for the support we have received from Stefi at the reception, the security guards and the housekeeping team ! They were so well planned and organized! We felt welcomed and valued. Once again, thank you for the opportunity and your support is highly appreciated

top_reviews.title: The Best Summer Camp in Children City
top_reviews.review: Children City one of the best places for Summer Camp. My daughter hand a fantastic and enjoyable time during the 2 weeks. They have variety and different activities every day, also daily trips to wonderful places. They have good security to keep kids safe, plus buggy take the parents to gate. I would like to thanks all the supervisors and helper that make this summer camp interesting and unique than others. Amna Ismaeel (mom)

top_reviews.title: Educational and Informative - with scope and capacity to become a fantastic venue but lacking some creativity
top_reviews.review: A good entertaining venue, particularly during the summer. The exhibits are educational and informative. The planetarium also incorporates very interesting materials showcasing videos purpose made for young children to educate in a fun way. There was unfortunately not much guidance from staff to engage the children, which other locations in Dubai benefit from - i.e. where staff direct and interact with children and bring exhibits to life. I feel more could be done with the expansive space available too to really make this is a must-go-to venue. At the moment, it is somewhat treated as an add-on if visiting the dolphinarium but they could invest some creativity into making this a standalone visit. Pricing is reasonable but perhaps on the high side considering what is currently offered. My daughter was able to do some facepainting which she thoroughly enjoyed and there is a small softplay for very young children too.

top_reviews.title: An outstanding harbor for kids
top_reviews.review: Enrolled my daughter for summer camp, am amazed how is she enjoying and so eager to attend . This shows the amount of dedication, excellence, commitment of the whole staff of Dubai s child city . They are really hardworking, caring and supportive to parents and kids They deserve ðððÙØ¹Ø·ÙÙÙ Ø§ÙØ¹Ø§ÙÙÙ Ù Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ù Ø§ÙÙÙ ÙÙÙÙ Ù Ø£Ø³Ø¹Ø¯ÙÙ ÙÙØ§ Ø£Ø³Ø¹Ø¯ØªÙ Ø£Ø¨ÙØ§Ø¦ÙØ§ ð¤²ð» Ø£Ù ÙÙØ§Ø¡ Ø§ÙØ´Ø§ÙØ³Ù

name: Jumeirah Mosque
description: The Jumeirah Mosque has been a focal point for our âOpen Doors. Open Minds.â program for over two decades, an opportunity to interact with your guide, ask plenty of questions and take photographs. Join us for a visit at the iconic Jumeirah Mosque, one of the most popular mosque visit in Dubai which are open to non-Muslims. Register at our Majlis, and enjoy light Emirati refreshments before the presentation starts. Booking is not required for public visits. Modest clothing is preferred. Ladies are required to bring their own head cover/scarf. First guided Mosque visit at 10:00am Second guided Mosque visit at 2:00pm Registration begins 30 minutes before the program starts Price: AED 35 (Includes light refreshments and all majlis activities) Open from Saturday to Thursday. Closed on Friday.

top_reviews.title: Open Doors, Open Minds. Truly worthwhile!
top_reviews.review: A visit to this mosque and participation in the program allows for learning about a different culture/religion. We had the ability to ask questions in a âsafe spaceâ without fear of saying or seeing the wrong thing. I highly recommend participating. A great way we started our visit to Dubai!

top_reviews.title: Fantastic Visit
top_reviews.review: Well worth a visit. Beautiful building and incredibly informative. You are made to feel so incredibly welcome, everyone is approachable and keen to share their beliefs with you. The tour guide we have was wonderful and tan the tour in a really light hearted way. Loved seeing the womenâs prayer room filled with toys - itâs a living, breathing place of worship. Not stuffy at all. Thoroughly recommend.

top_reviews.title: Jumeirah mosque visit
top_reviews.review: Great, informative and friendly tour. Food from the buffet was lovely way to start the tour. Tour guide was really calm and friendly , used lots of life situations and funny stories that were taken really well by public. Falcon photo and the henna tattoo is a sweet cherry at the top of the cake. Thank you for this great experience , hope to come back soon.

top_reviews.title: Beautiful mosque and kind people
top_reviews.review: This was a great experience. We were welcomed with open arms. We got received with local sweets and could walk around a gallery and the museum part. After this we went inside the mosque. This mosque is beautiful decorated and was very calming. Our guide told us a lot about Islam and the mosque with pride. You can see how much he cares for the mosque. We were encouraged to ask as many questions as we could think of, and i did. This was an amazing experience and we were so happy that we saw another part of Dubai as well.

top_reviews.title: A true gift
top_reviews.review: The whole experience was mesmerizing. The staff was very kind and provided us with extensive information on Islam's rituals, story and habits. I would strongly recommend the attraction to truly understand and experience an introduction to this faith, providing a respectful approach towards intercultural dialogue and coexistence.

top_reviews.title: Mosque visit in Dubai
top_reviews.review: This was a very interesting program introducing us to the Muslim faith. Our guide was very engaging and answered our questions well. Inside the mosque, the echo sometimes made it difficult to understand or hear everything he was saying.

top_reviews.title: Don't miss this beautiful mosque!
top_reviews.review: This is a canât miss attraction in Dubai. For less than $10 US, you can tour a beautiful mosque, experience Arabic coffee and have a beautiful henna tattoo. My tour guide was friendly, welcoming and knowledge. It was one of my Dubai highlights.

top_reviews.title: Highly Recomended!
top_reviews.review: This place was awesome you will learn a lot and understand more about Islam and culture of UAE the best. If you are new or expat in UAE this is a must. Levhan is very welcoming, Latifa is superb and all of the staff have a welcoming smile. Thank you for this experience.

top_reviews.title: The most amazing and organized Mosque tour
top_reviews.review: The most amazing and well organized mosque tour I have seen. Me and my mum enjoyed the tour conducted by Ahmed. Who is fun and engaging. He speaks good english and im sure everyone understands him. We truly feel the arabic culture and Islam. Thanks to UAE for this wonderful experience.

top_reviews.title: Very interesting visit
top_reviews.review: Such an interesting tour led by our guide Ahmed. We learnt a lot about the mosque and Emirati culture within Islam. We were able to ask questions to find out more and were welcomed with local coffee and snacks. A wonderful mid afternoon outing.

name: Sea Lion Point
description: Imagine a magical encounter with sea lions in a safe and indoor environment. At Sea Lion Point, that dream can become a reality. With a range of interactive experiences, you can get up-close with these amazing marine mammals and show you how we take care of them while helping you to develop a greater appreciation and respect for marine life.
address: Crescent Rd Atlantis, The Palm, Dubai 00000 United Arab Emirates

top_reviews.title: Amazing and educational tour!
top_reviews.review: We were given a tour of the sea lion and dolphin houses and were amazed at what we learned. Wanda was great in hosting us and Timi taught us so much when showing us round. We were allowed to watch 4 month old baby Kai being trained surrounded by all the generations of his family. Weâre going back on Monday for an encounter with them and we canât wait!

top_reviews.title: Out of this world . Wow
top_reviews.review: Unique experience. Very friendly staff! And unforgettable moments. Iâve done also the dolphin experience which is also beautiful. Although the price for the photos are over the top. The experience itself is expensive so itâs a bit sad when a family has to pay also a big amount of money money for the photosâ¦.

top_reviews.title: Magical
top_reviews.review: Really lovely staff. The experience was very well organised. A very magical experience and I was made to feel very welcome as I was doing the experience alone. Swan the sea lion very lovely to meet and spend time with.

top_reviews.title: Aqaventure Dubai Sea Lion Point
top_reviews.review: The program was extremely well organized. The people were very friendly and supportive. I recommend everyone who goes to Dubai to go and swim with the sea lions! Many thanks to the hosts Shamim, Francis and the Trainers Shazir Lorena.

top_reviews.title: Amazing
top_reviews.review: Great activity and experience. We had a tour of the facilities at Aquadventure, and went on to book an experience with the dolphins. The whole thing was great, a once in a lifetime experience that we will never forget. We got to have a close up encounter with a dolphin that was amazing. Special thatâs to Megan, Keira and George for making it such a great day. Highly recommend.

top_reviews.title: Great Experience
top_reviews.review: Marcos and the team were very friendly and welcoming. We had a great experience meeting Rufus and learnt a bit about his specie. It was also great to get up and close. Only thing that could have improved the experience was spending more time with Rufus (Sea Lion) as it was only about 15 minutes. However, we had a great time. Thanks Winda, Tamwryn, Marcus and Rufus!

top_reviews.title: Swimming with Juna
top_reviews.review: Absolutely mesmerizing! Swimming with the sea lions was a unique and unforgettable experience. Their playful nature and gentle interaction left me in awe. The trainers were professional, ensuring our safety while allowing us to enjoy this intimate encounter. It's a must-do for any animal lover. 5 stars without a doubt!

top_reviews.title: Amazing experience with Swan!
top_reviews.review: My family and I visited the lovely sealion point yet again and it was nothing short of amazing! We had a wonderful time meeting the beautiful Swan! She was amazing, and taught us so much! You can tell the trainers truly care for them. Thank you again Nola, Corn and Shazeel! Absolutely brilliant experience would highly recommend!!

top_reviews.title: Out of my expectations! Fantastic and very enjoyable moment!
top_reviews.review: The Palm Altantic hotel offered this complementary dolphin tour for our family. This was a bonus trip and great surprise to us. The guide Marouf was very friendly and patient to us. We have a very enjoyable moment with him and the dolphins!

top_reviews.title: Sea lion experience with Connor and Loretta
top_reviews.review: We had Connor and loretta talk to us about the sea lions , was an amazing experience to get up close with them. Both Connor and Loretta were very knowledgeable and explained a lot to us about the sea lion. They were both very funny and had a great sense of humour which was very nice. They made our experience worth every penny.

name: Ibn Battuta Mall
description: Ibn Battuta Mall blends shopping, dining and entertainment with history, culture and the story of a remarkable explorer. It is the largest themed shopping mall in Dubai and one of the cityâs most exciting shopping and retail destinations.

top_reviews.title: Loved this Themed Mall
top_reviews.review: Amazing mall. It's huge, loved the different themed sections. Great food options along with great shopping. We were staying next door in the Avani hotel so visiting the mall was so convenient. Spent 2 days trying to see it all & visit as many shops that were pertinent to us. Bought men's & women's clothes (great to find big sizes) jewellery along with supplies from the Carrefours supermarket. Lovely cafes n 2 big food halls. There is a train station adjacent. Have previously been to The Dubai Mall & the Mall of the Emirates & while perhaps not as big it was still a great mall

top_reviews.title: ibn battuta mall dubai
top_reviews.review: ibn battuta mall dubai I was with family and 3-4 hour we don't know how it gone. Beautiful mall with lots of shopping brand, food stalls are Amazing ð Must visit if you are in Dubai highly recommended ð

top_reviews.title: Amazing architectural design
top_reviews.review: It is of the oldest malls in Dubai. I once visited this place 15 years ago,since then it has changed a lot. The one thing that has remained is the large ship and water fountain. My favourite part of the mall is the huge dome in the middle, surrounded by coffee shops.

name: Dubai Marina
description: This luxurious waterfront district adjacent to the Palm Jumeirah is lined with glittering skyscrapers, exclusive residences, and breezy boulevards that are entirely man-made.

top_reviews.title: The best
top_reviews.review: People are so nice and very accomadating, their smile were so warmth and welcoming. Also the guy Mr.Vaibhav was so nice and told us to ask him if we needed anything else. Forgot his name but surely I will recommend this resto for my friends ð

top_reviews.title: Lovely area but be on the look out
top_reviews.review: A beautiful area to walk around either in the day or night, but the lights make the evening experience a little more enjoyable. Loads of smart restaurants and cafes to eat and drink at and not too expensive for the area. Just two issues that we didnât enjoy which stops me giving it 5 stars 1/ Some of the touts trying to get you to eat in their restaurant were a bit invasive and stopped a nice leisurely walk. Others are not a problem when you say you have eaten or meeting someone. Just be prepared! 2/ the second issue was a real nuisance and that is the E scooters that plague the area. They travel at some speed and you canât here them, they also have electric buggies that are a nuisance as well. I get that it would be beneficial for people with mobility problems but this is just for fun. Please be aware of your environment as there a few near misses. Personally Iâd like to see them stopped as it stops you relaxing as you walk about. Some fabulous yachts in the marina to drool over as well. There is also the marina mall which is pleasant to walk around

top_reviews.title: Beautiful marina
top_reviews.review: The area is very beautiful. It is surrounded by skyscrapers, with a waterfront promenade, there are many restaurants (but very few also serve alcohol...). There are also a few small grocery stores where you can buy water or juice at reasonable prices. Also, there is a mall, but it is not the most beautiful in Dubai. In the evening, the employees of the restaurants trying to convince you to stop at them are a bit annoying. The area is much more spectacular and livelier in the evening.

top_reviews.title: Cool Area
top_reviews.review: We really enjoyed our time walking around in this area. Many of Dubai's other tall buildings are here and we enjoyed the architecture and design in the area. It is worthwhile checking out a restaurant in this area to sit and enjoy the views with some good. The closest metro is DMCC and there are a few tram connections nearby. Plan to spend a couple of hours here in cooler months and more if you plan to dine here.

top_reviews.title: Cleanliness and bright atmosphere
top_reviews.review: Tall buildings with different architecture and cleanliness was eye catching. Dubai government do truly amazing job at keeping the city bright and clean. Had a good time walking around with friends

top_reviews.title: Awesome!
top_reviews.review: Amazing city! Very clean, very organized! We went on business, but had the opportunity to visit The Frame, Miracle Garden, The Global Village. The best experience was a Safari trip to the Red Dessert, but the magical moment was private night yacht cruise!

top_reviews.title: A Nice Walk With Lovely Views
top_reviews.review: This is a walk recommended in all the travel guides, so we too had a wander. It had a nice breeze (as it had been very hot), nice views of the boats, the Mosque lighted up, restaurants dotting the walkway area, and lots of people strolling along. We chose to have dinner at an outdoor restaurant and ended up at a Lebanese Place. Its always hit and miss if you have not read reviews etc, and we struck it lucky. We had a very tasty dinner while watching the world go by.

top_reviews.title: Beautiful walk
top_reviews.review: Beautiful walk round, as per the title. Very picturesque and pleasant to walk along the river. You have the mall in the centre with plenty of restaurants and shops to check out. Outside you can grab a boat tour, something we did. Theyâll be a lot of people outside trying to promote boat trips - one of which we did - and we did a private cruise for two around Palm Jumeirah, despite it being very bumpy once you exit the marina and head out into open water.

top_reviews.title: Peaceful area for a weekend stroll
top_reviews.review: A nice area to have a wander round, and it was surprisingly quiet on a sunny morning in January. Thereâs loads of cafes and restaurants along the waterfront so you can spend a long period of time there, and thereâs plenty of spots to sit and watch the world go by. Thereâs the option of taking a boat ride but it didnât appear to be a regular or frequent service. If youâre looking for somewhere with a slower pace and to relax, head here.

top_reviews.title: Recommend for a visit
top_reviews.review: Fantastic place, unbelievably clean, no litter, no graffiti, no groups of kids hanging around. Lots of restaurants and some shops, great vibe during the evening. Felt very safe. I would recommend a walk round the Marina walk amazing skyline and photo opportunities

name: The View Palm Jumeirah
description: Stunning 360-degree views 240 meters above the world-famous Palm Jumeirah. At 240 meters high, The View on level 52 of the iconic Palm Tower offers panoramic, 360-degree views of Palm Jumeirah, the Arabian Gulf, and beyond from an outdoor terrace and a premium lounge. Spot iconic landmarks and hidden gems of this beautiful city.

top_reviews.title: For a great view of the Palm!
top_reviews.review: Definitely worth doing! Gives you such a great view of the Palm! Make sure you go early to avoid the queues! Or even a fast track ticket. They manage the lines well-waited in line maybe 20-30 min. Also donât forget to go to the upper level-view even better! No pylons in the way. in You do need to be able to climb 2 flights of stairs!

top_reviews.title: Advance book tickets and be mindful of peak rates after 4 pm when tickets are 50 percent higher
top_reviews.review: I could not get a ticket to visit the top at the counter. Please book your tickets in advance to get to this place. Also please be mindful of the peak rates after 4 pm The rates are 50 perverse higher. Also it closes at 8 pm

top_reviews.title: A great evening out learning about the creation of Palm Island and top tier views
top_reviews.review: We visited The View at the Palm during a 10 day stay in Dubai stopping at the famous Atlantis the Palm. From Atlantis is was easy to reach on the metro to Nakheel Mall then taking the elevator to the top. We went at night time but we have said if we come again we would like to go in the day too. The 360 views are amazing. If you have a nervous disposition to heights this probably isn't for you but try and push through it like my husband did as it will be worth it. Even I felt wobbly standing on some of the glass platforms! You can buy professional photos at the end. Staff are really friendly and our daughter enjoyed running around. Was also interesting learning about the history of Palm island and the creation of it before you go out to the viewing deck. All in all, a good evening out. Also food and drinks outlets there.

top_reviews.title: Loved the whole experience
top_reviews.review: Originally the view was not in our plans as we had done the burj khalifa and travelling with children I thought they wouldnât enjoy it. But one free afternoon we hopped on the metro and decided to take a look. And wow Iâm so glad we did! It was much more than just a view, we enjoyed the whole experience, with the interactive floor telling the story of how it was made, the little cinema etc. and the view was just something else. I could have spent all day up there never getting bored of it. We had some lovely photos taken up there, enjoyed the gift shop and cafe. Iâm so glad we decided to go. One side was in the full sun and therefore very very hot but the other side was shaded so the children enjoyed that side more. Iâd definately recommend and would go again myself.

top_reviews.title: Great way to explore and view The Palm
top_reviews.review: Great experience learning about The palm and how it was created. A quick interactive and informative session provided about the area before we were taken to the 42nd floor viewing platform. The view is amazing! Would highly recommend.

top_reviews.title: Best View of Palm Jumeirah
top_reviews.review: Amazing view of the iconic Palm Jumeirah. I think this is the best view of the island, which you cannot get anywhere else. We went to the queue quite early so we did not have to wait long. The Nakheel mall is also very accessible and the entrance to the top deck is very easy to navigate, as they have an in-house online map which you can get when you scan the QR code at the mall entrance. However, even though it was September at that time, and according to the locals, the temperature is a bit better, it was still boiling hot at the top deck. The official souvenir photographer took us to the rooftop and asked us to do lying and sitting poses, touching the sweltering hot surface. I liked the photos though, only because of the view (my face looked like I was burning) so I bought them. I was really surprised to find that they were really expensive! I was not going to buy them because of the price but (A) I felt obliged since the photographer took many photos (maybe almost a hundred) and (B) you cannot get the few photos you like unless you pay for the whole package! Upon checking my online banking I felt a deep regret as I spent Â£67 for photos!! It came in a nice frame though but I still felt cheated. I know it's not their fault because they told us the price before they showed us the photos at the shop (not before they took them) but it was not a nice experience for me paying that much for what I expected to be a reasonable price. The photos were more expensive than the entrance fee itself. Anyway I cannot take that money back now but I brought back memories (the good and the bad!) with me and I will forever remember that moment where I was at the top, seeing the view of the Palm.

top_reviews.title: Is was great
top_reviews.review: It was unreal beautiful, i saw it and i loved it. One of the best place in Dubai. When you will come to Dubai, i recommend to visit this place. And thanks to Anastasia, she is doing her work very well and always smiling.

top_reviews.title: Amazing Experience at The View At The Palm
top_reviews.review: Amazing view of the The Palm Jumeirah with world-class service. Excellent customer interaction and very accommodating staff. Special thanks to Mr. Keith who made our visit to The View At The Palm extra special and truly an experience my family will never forget.

top_reviews.title: Best Nakheel experience.
top_reviews.review: Amazing experience with my family. Went there way back 2021 and Covid was still a pandemic. However, the professionalism and hospitality of staff are exceptional. Safety is always their first priority and making sure the guest will remember The View experience as one their best. Furthermore, not only you will enjoy The View experience, yet to will have a chance to visit one of dubais best mall, Nakheel mall. Special mention to Mr. Keith for providing us all the information we need, hes product knowledge blown us away. We definetly recommend this awesome experience.

top_reviews.title: The whole experience is the best!!
top_reviews.review: The view is amazing ð We had another of photos! The whole experience is excellent start from welcome area to cashiers to the staff inside the journey are all happy to assist us. Imagine even security guards has a lot of knowledge about the view too! Well done.

name: City Centre Mirdif
description: With more than 400 stores, this mall truly caters to all audiences and budgets. Find international brands like Lululemon and Desigual as well as more local labels including Almotahajiba and Hanayen.

name: Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark
description: As the worldâs largest waterpark, Aquaventure World is great for all ages. Take on the Odyssey of Terror, the worldâs tallest waterslide; experience weightlessness on the Zoomerangoâs vertical wall; and zoom through a tube that goes through a shark-filled underwater lagoon on Shark Attack. Bust your moves at the surf area, cliff-jump at Immortal Falls, and let the little ones loose at the Splashers Kidsâ Play Area.
duration: Duration: More than 3 hours Tripadvisor does not provide bookings for this experience because it does not meet our animal welfare guidelines.

top_reviews.title: Thank you Madhuri & Happy Patrick
top_reviews.review: The first time in my life I work out in a vacation. We were having fun in Atlantis pool and Madhuri & Happy Patrick attracted the whole crowd in the pool with a superb summer vibe and positivity. The in-pool aerobic exercise was fun and stress reliever. Thank you Madhuri & Happy Patrick for the great experience I had with you.

top_reviews.title: Amazing experience with Hydro watersports
top_reviews.review: I did flyboarding at the Atlantis Hotel in Dubai with Hydro watersports. Experience was amazing and definitely recommend doing this - and be sure to ask for Sam for excellent pictures - what an amazing photographer he is, he captured the whole experience. Can't wait to return and see him again. Sam the man.

top_reviews.title: Hydro water sports
top_reviews.review: A big thanks to the photographer sam. My daughter had a great time with the e. jet ski. And sam he make a good photos for her really thanks for photos itâs amazing and I feeling a good service from hydro water sports I will come back again thanks Atlantis thanks hydro water sports thanks sam photographer

top_reviews.title: Friendly staff
top_reviews.review: The best water park weâve ever been to. The staff are so friendly and everywhere is spotless! Itâs so big it doesnât feel too busy anywhere and lots of sun beds. Food is superb we ate in the barracudas food hall.

top_reviews.title: Happy Happy & Thank You to Patrick & Madhuri - Aqua Aerobics @ Atlantis the Palm - Dubai
top_reviews.review: Aqua Aerobic sessions run by Happy Patrick and his colleague Madhuri were outstanding. The planning, effort, exercises/music and guest engagement were the best we have ever seen (anywhere). It was a pleasure to welcome Patrick & Madhuri to the pool everyday and watch the fun begin, the guests loved them and the crowds they drew in through their sheer hard work, personalities and love for what they done shone through. It would be nice for the hotel management to acknowledge both Patrick and Madhuri for their hard work and efforts, we hope that they could be rewarded in some way, by way of thank from us (and no doubt all the guest who enjoyed their sessions). Tracy & Paul

top_reviews.title: Perfect Getaway for the birthdays
top_reviews.review: Have a great family adventure for my daughter 4th bday. Madhav and Madan were helping us through our at the premium seating section. Didnât quite feel the heat as they were at our beck and call for any F&B service we wanted.

top_reviews.title: Simply The Best!
top_reviews.review: Our second visit was wonderful. Park very clean, well organised and sign posted. Slides are all epic. Plenty of food and drink places. Was extremely hot when we visited at 39Â°! But we managed to cool off with snow bomb drinks!

top_reviews.title: Impressive place!
top_reviews.review: Amazing place full of offers for the entire family. For us, the Dolphin encounter was fun, as well as the two rivers. We recommend booking a cabana at the entrance for a full experience and confort in the park. Ours was great, thanks to Justin L, our welcoming host. Thanks Justin! Other advises: book online tickets, otherwise do expect an extra queue. Be punctual for your dolphin experience, keep in mind the place is opposite the entrance and takes you 15-25 min to get there. Towels and swim socks you will find in the park. As well as food and soft drinks. Swim shirts long sleeves, hat and sun glasses should be on your bring along list. Entrance and exit is done through the hotel wing, they dont allow shirtless visitors, make sure you bring extra t-shirt for leaving. Have fun ð

top_reviews.title: I recommend taking a photo session in Atlantis
top_reviews.review: I came on vacation to Atlantis Palm to celebrate my birthday with my family. I am incredibly pleased with the work of the photographer of this hotel - Sam. We used his services twice and were satisfied both times. He is brave and will tell you how best to take the photo so that it turns out perfect.

top_reviews.title: Hydro aqua atp
top_reviews.review: Great time had by my son 11 years old. He loved it. He did the electric jet ski. Haroun was very helpful and was great definitely we will back again thanks a lot hydro guys

name: Dubai Autodrome
description: Located just 20 minutes from central Dubai, the Dubai Autodrome Circuit is an FIA Grade 1 race circuit that incorporates various different experiences for kids, adults and families - these include: - our Race & Drive Center, where you can enjoy the thrill of driving various road and race cars on the circuit. -Indoor and Outdoor Kartdrome for kids aged from 7 years and upwards -Lasertag center -Motorsport Events, Dubai Autodrome hosts national and international sporting events including the famous 24H Dubai race Asian Le Mans Series & The Gulf Historic Dubai GP Revival.
address: Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Rd Motor City, Dubai 57331 United Arab Emirates

top_reviews.title: Awesome feeling of "need for speed"
top_reviews.review: Had the opportunity to do a driving experience taking the BMW M3 Competition out. Wow, what speed and massive thanks to my instructor, Mike, his guidance was awesome to get the most of the frills drivng this beast. Definiately recommend this.

top_reviews.title: Such an incredible experience!
top_reviews.review: Everyone were so nice, instructors gave very personal treatment, allowed us to ask all the questions and feel comfortable getting into the car. Answered my every request getting ready, and explaining everything. Car was fasttt and track was excellent, video quality is great, really recommended!!

top_reviews.title: Driving Experience
top_reviews.review: All I can say is wow, what a wonderful experience. Fantastic facility, amazing track and friendly staff. Thank you for making me feel so welcome and the instructors were so helpful. Will recommend the Dubai Autodrome driving experience to any adrenaline seeking person.

top_reviews.title: Formula DXB Max Experience
top_reviews.review: I did the Formula DXB Max experience and thoroughly loved it! My instructor, Fidel, gave a great briefing prior to driving and answered all questions. I was able to get on track with another instructor, Kuda, who was fantastic as well. He brought me up to speed quickly and I was able to drive as fast as I was capable of, since it was just he & I in our group. After the session, Kuda gave me instruction on how I could improve my driving, which was much appreciated. I will be back soon! One area could be improved on, which is the lighting at night. The area around turn 1 is a bit dark and could use some additional lighting and the lighting around the chicane could be modified so that it doesn't shine in your eyes coming up through the chicane. Looking forward to my next experience! Cheers!

top_reviews.title: Spectacular!
top_reviews.review: Very nice ans spectacular ride on the circuit with a very capable driver who is also a nice guy. I took a passenger ride in the BMW M20, fabulous car. You can watch other cars on the circuit as wel and the people are very relaxed. Recommended!

top_reviews.title: Excellent racing experience
top_reviews.review: We came for a passenger ride in a Ferrari 458 GT. All service personnel was very friendly and helpful. Organisation was very structured and safety standards were on a very high level, for example triple checking if seat belts were fastened correctly. The race car had brand new front tires so we got an extra round for free to experience full speed - it was excellent! Is this a helpful review? Then please give me a "Thumbs up Thank FrankGeisler" by clicking the button below.

top_reviews.title: M2 Experience
top_reviews.review: Amazing race track offering plenty of different experiences from open wheel single seaters to sports cars. I did the M2 Experience and aside from it being a little too short it was amazing. Instructors give you all the necessary information and confidence and depending on your skills let you push the cars quite a bit. Everybody from the staff is very friendly.

top_reviews.title: Great experience !! Highly recommended !!
top_reviews.review: I've been to Dubai Autodrome approx. 6 times in the last 2 years and couldn't rate it more highly !! Tarek, Rehan and Mario are all fantastic and help everyone from a novice to the more experienced. Now my wife has started to join me in the experiences offered.

top_reviews.title: Must try if you live to drive.
top_reviews.review: Been on my bucket list for a long time. Booked months in advance to drive the BMW 240i. Was a fantastic experience. You get around 7 laps with an instructor. Takes time to get used to the left hand drive. But a must try. Many cars to choose. The location is a bit outside of main Dubai, but taxis are pretty much easy to get.

top_reviews.title: F1 Experience 11/10
top_reviews.review: I did the F1 track experience and it was worth every penny. My instructor Sean was very thorough and informative. He started by briefing me on what to expect followed by driving me around the track in a BMW M3 for familiarization. I then drove a couple laps in a 2-seater racecar as Sean rode along, in order to get me comfortable on the track. This gave me a chance to get familiar with braking zones and corner exits before hopping into the beast. Then there was the F1 drive itself. I definitely stalled out a couple times leaving the pit lane, but the engineers were very helpful in getting me moving. By far the best driving experience I've had. If you ever get the opportunity, this is something you don't want to miss. This was my first time on a race track. I hadn't driven a manual car any time recently, but I do a lot of sim racing. You definitely want to be comfortable with when to shift, but the clutch is only used for getting into 1st gear. Once you get going, it's all paddle shifters from there. This was a blast, and I highly recommend Sean as an instructor.

name: AURA SKYPOOL
description: Suspended 200 metres in the air, AURA SKYPOOL is the worldâs highest 360-degree infinity pool offering incredible views of the iconic Dubai skyline, Palm Jumeirah and the glistening horizon of the Arabian Gulf. AURA is a one-of-a-kind experience triggering all the senses, and a truly unmissable spot to capture the essence Dubai at new heights.
category: Observation Decks & Towers Observatories & Planetariums Beach & Pool Clubs

top_reviews.title: Amazing experience
top_reviews.review: Wow! What can I say, this place is just amazing! The views are just wow. You must visit this place if coming to dubai! Make sure you book early. The staff Kavindu and Raj are amazing can't fault them!

top_reviews.title: 10/10 experience
top_reviews.review: Nico and Yin Minâs service were outstanding. We came for my friends 30th birthday and from start to finish they made the experience so special and I canât fault their service at all. Would 100% recommend.

top_reviews.title: Must do experience in Dubai
top_reviews.review: Amazing view of Dubai. Must do experience- we had a lounge chair facing the palm. Gorgeous view and the pool goes all the way around. Helpful staff and great welcome gift. Highly recommend

top_reviews.title: Great yoga dance class in the sky!
top_reviews.review: Imagine the view of the palm and a breezy yoga class in the sky at 8am - thank you Nuni for a great time! We really enjoyed our experience. The yoga class was followed by breakfast which was a limited, but tasty selection of breakfast items with allergens listed + accommodated. Thank you Marvin for your service!

top_reviews.title: Fantastic! A must to visit when in Dubai.
top_reviews.review: Absolutely amazing place! I knew it was going to be good but it blew my expectations! The views from the pool are out of this world and to see the sunset from there over the palm was fantastic! The service and food was 5*! A must to visit when Iâm Dubai!

top_reviews.title: Absolutely Superb!
top_reviews.review: Absolutely superb! Not many experiences now we havenât done, but this was one of them and wow, just wow! Itâs not cheap but it is so worth the money. See less arrival and entrance after a short wait in the lobby. But from the minute you step out of the lift, the views are just amazing. We paid the little extra for a front row Sunbed, Ain side facing the wheel and Blue waters, the sun was just coming round as we arrived at 10, and it was constant until we left at 2. The food and drink was very expensive, but wonderful and in those surroundings it was worth every single penny. Get it booked!

top_reviews.title: Impeccable!
top_reviews.review: We had such a wonderful time in aura sky pool. Special thanks goes to Fabio ans Bibec for looking after us. Everything was impeccable. The view, the food, the service and even little sweet things like free sun glasses cleaning service!

top_reviews.title: Amazing!!
top_reviews.review: Absolutely amazing experience! The views are stunning. The staff couldnât do enough for you. Food and drinks were delicious. Shout out to Fabio for coming round and cleaning our sunglasses for us, nice little touch. We will definitely come back when in Dubai again. Thank you for making the morning so special.

top_reviews.title: Aura sky pool October 3p
top_reviews.review: Shiva was our server very kind and helpful. Enjoyed our experience, we had to wait 20 mins to enter at 3pm. Food was excellent and drinks. We tried to exchange cash to tip waiter but this wasnât allowed which seemed unfair. Would return. Thank you

top_reviews.title: Amazing place and amazing staff!
top_reviews.review: Incredible place! Nikolas and Hamzah really look after us, made our last night of our honeymoon really special treated us like kings and queens. Big thank you to the manger for moving our seats too! If you are coming to Dubai this place is a must visit! Thank you so much 10/10!

name: Pier 7
category: Points of Interest & Landmarks Architectural Buildings
getting_there: Jumeirah Lake Towers â¢ 8 min walk

name: White Beach
description: WHITE Beach welcomes you to the hottest beachfront destination. Featuring two Instagram-worthy pools, a chic outdoor restaurant perfect for sunset cocktail-sipping. This is the place to be and to be seen.

top_reviews.title: Family Lunch at WHITE beach - AMAZING profiteroles!
top_reviews.review: We couldn't not visit WHITE beach during a family holiday at Atlantis. Although my husband and I would have loved to make use of the beach club, obviously toddlers were not allowed here, but we could have lunch in the restaurant and we were not disappointed. The food was delicious, green juices, bread and oil, kale salad, pasta and the most amazing profiterole stack for dessert! Great music, great atmosphere, attentive staff, spotlessly clean and it was no problem getting a lunchtime reservation. The beach club itself looked fabulous, everything you would hope it would be - glamourous, boujee, a vibe. They even had a bird of prey next to the DJ set.

top_reviews.title: 5 star
top_reviews.review: I love White Beachâ¦ but what really stood out today was the guy taking care of me for the day, Kieran. Extremely personable, very attentive, nothing was too much trouble. This guy knows how to make people feel looked after and thatâs what we want, right! Make sure you give him every opportunity to excel at white beach, heâs a keeper!

top_reviews.title: Wonderful White Beach
top_reviews.review: Amazing day at White Beach Club! Wow, absolutely beautiful decor and scenery. Great vibes all day thanks to the exceptional beats by Tim Davis! Service was excellent too, thanks Marks for making sure our drinks were full! See you all again!

top_reviews.title: Lovely start to the evening
top_reviews.review: Lovely nights, great setting, beautiful restaurant and can't rate Shaun highly enough. Absolute gentleman, great fun, very attentive. To be honest all the hosts were exceptional. Michael

top_reviews.title: Dubaiâs White Beach Club Nails It!
top_reviews.review: Service is top-notch, I was greeted warmly by not just the service representative. But by Security, as well. I already knew what I wanted in terms of a reservation, and there was availability, granted, I did arrive just at opening. The representative walked me over to the pool where I was going to be spending the day with my wife and she explained the amenities and restaurant availability. I was waited on by a very friendly chap, Mr. Aiban, who was very attentive throughout my entire stay, constantly refilling the ice bucket, and taking care of my orders promptly and with diligence. The restaurant was terrific: we had the dragon roll and beef tartare along with a meringue dessert; we very much enjoyed the meal. The changing room and bathroom is roomy, but just enough. There are two showers in the menâs side and you can lock the door while you are in the shower and there is a small changing area adjacent to the shower stall. Everything is nice, clean, and tidy. The facility is extremely well-maintained, the view of the water leading to the Persian Gulf is lovely and tranquil. Note: you are looking at two story residences across the way, but you have a metropolitan skyline beyond that which I enjoyed viewing. As you face the water, the sun will set to your right. If it is very windy, umbrellas may not always be opened. Make sure you bring everything you normally would to a beach club as prices are quite high, although the quality is top-notch. White Beach is a terrific beach club, destination, and one more thing, the DJ plays an awesome mix nonstopâ you just canât help but get into that beach club vibe! Well done, White Beach organization!

top_reviews.title: Amazing beach day
top_reviews.review: This is the perfect beach day! Cocktails are delicious. Nice chilled vibes earlier in the day. Service was incredible. Thank you Marks for looking after us and catering for all our needs. We canât wait to come back

top_reviews.title: Best beach club on the Palm!
top_reviews.review: Wow. Amazing beach club and restaurant! Perfect location, amazing music and show dancers, delicious food. Top location in Dubai right on the palm its one of the best Iâve been to .

top_reviews.title: Love the vibe, food and the Music
top_reviews.review: I was on a Saturday lunch at white beach , amazing atmosphere with live dj the front view and restaurant decorations boho style just amazing. You have a privat chattle to the restaurant from parking and a lot of food options on the menu. Everything was amazing. Loved the place .

top_reviews.title: Best beach club in Dubai
top_reviews.review: The best and our favorite beach club in Dubai. Top hospitality experience. The waiters who assisted us are very attentive, professional and friendly. Shame we forgot to ask their names. It was a Greek guy at the beach. And a lady wearing reading eye glasses. Delicious and amazing food. Facilities is amazing. We love the setting and atmosphere of the outdoor restaurant. Toilet and shower area is clean and maintained well. There are 2 pools and private dipping pool with private cabana. Vibrant atmosphere, amazing music, the distance between the sunbeds is decent unlike other beach clubs. My 3rd time in White Beach. This beach club is definitely a must visit if you are in Dubai!

top_reviews.title: Amazing place
top_reviews.review: Beautiful Restaurant I went with my friend for lunch to the restaurant and the atmosphere was great, the DJ was awesome kept us enjoying the whole time! The staff was very professional, Melissa was great looking after us recommending dishes that combined the place. We had a great time and I would really recommend it

name: Al Shindagha Museum
description: The iconic Dubai Creek area is the home to our museum, where visitors can experience the vibrant history of Dubai. It was developed as part of an initiative to transform the creek into a regional culture and traditional centre. Shindagha Museum tells the universal tale of human innovation, resilience, and the desire for progress which shaped the Dubai of nowadays.

top_reviews.title: One of best museum experience I ever have
top_reviews.review: The other day I have been to the Al Shindagha museum, and I really love the experience. Al Shindagha museum is actually a group of house, each represents a different subject, including Arabic Perfume, Poetry, Tradition Life on Lands/Coastal and so much more. Each house is well designed and full of interactivity, so it is a good choice for family and those who want to learn different aspect of Emirate culture. The staff at the museum are very helpful, some of the house staff will introduce you in detail about the subject of the house, and they are really friendly. It will probably take 3 to 4 hours if you want to go through most of the houses, it will be a excellent experience and remember to take some water with you.

top_reviews.title: Children Pavillion, great expirience for kids provided with staff delightful guided tours, exercising great patience towards ki
top_reviews.review: Children Pavillion, great expirience for kids provided with staff delightful guided tours, exercising great patience towards kids in offering training class on drawing, paper crafts etc. Both of my grandkids enjoyed a lot. Thanks to their mentor Ayesha especially for her Co.munication skills on understanding every child talent with short talk and offering them a suitable short training accordingly.

top_reviews.title: Al Shindagha Museum - Great experience
top_reviews.review: This is a hidden gem within Dubai. We were not sure what to expect, but 3+ hours and 20+ buildings later we came out with a much better understanding of the city and the immense history of it and interactions as a hub to other countries. It is an unconventional layout going from building to building and some of the displays were a little repetitive, but overall it was very informative and had some great photos and insight to Old Dubai. Great thought and lots of tech went into this museum. There were many staff on site and all were very friendly and knowledgeable. A great way to pass and afternoon or evening out.

top_reviews.title: Absolutely must visit!!!
top_reviews.review: We were very sorry that we found out about this museum only on our last day in Dubai, and we could not devote more than 2-3 hours. This museum is a hidden gem, as described previously, very UNDER PROMOTED as noted previously, and it is a great pity that it was empty....the tech is amazing, the content is amazing, the staff is very helpful, and you get to learn a lot about UAE and the Emirati culture and history. We would recommend to first time visitors, to put this museum at the top of their list. They will not be disappointed!!

top_reviews.title: What an excellent museum displaying the history of Old Dubai
top_reviews.review: I had visited the Al Shindagha Museum with a private tour when I was visiting Dubai for a graduate class. The staff could not have been nicer to us with the 45 minute tour we had of the museum. We got to see part of the introduction film and then we had a quick half hour tour of the museum with some of my classmates. The displays of ancient artifacts were very interesting. It is impressive how the museum preserved the City's past. Our tour guide explained the museum, what they were trying to accomplish and then took us room by room to see some of the displays. Even though it was a quick tour, I highly recommend a private tour of the museum so that you can see all the highlights of the museum. You need at least an hour in the museum.

top_reviews.title: Good Visit
top_reviews.review: The museum is stunning. Itâs very nicely laid out and there are people to direct you every step of the way even though itâs mostly self-guided. Clearly a lot of thought and planning went into it and it was really eye-opening and educational. I would plan for at least 3 hours to view all the pavilions. The restored historic houses were one of my favourite aspects of it although there were a lot of interactive and participatory elements as well. Itâs definitely definitely worth the trip. The staff were very friendly, welcoming, and knowledgeable as well, particularly in the jewellery section.

top_reviews.title: A visit that takes you back in time to an authentic and historic Dubai
top_reviews.review: A wonderful museum for anyone interested in learning about the history of Dubai and its rich culture, which extends from a long pearling tradition to the literary arts (poetry, calligraphy), perfumery and jewellery and so much more. The staff, and the guides in particular, are most welcoming. A special mention to Rahmah Alsadi and the team at the jewellers' house.

top_reviews.title: Good old story
top_reviews.review: Al Shindagha Museums among the newest, family-friendly Heritage Museums in Dubai which is spread over several buildings. All this gives you an insight into the culture, traditions and history of Dubai. If you like history about the places you visit, this is definitely a museum to see.
