That said we enjoyed the rides/attractions My personal highlight was the miniature area where the Buildings are truly outstanding. We completed in 2-3 hours at no great rush but it was empty.

top_reviews.title: Legoland Park: A Colorful Paradise for Lego Lovers!
top_reviews.review: Legoland Park is a must-visit for Lego lovers! While it's primarily for children, I had a great time snapping pictures and exploring the Mini Land. The attention to detail is spot on, and the park offers something for everyone. The staff was friendly and helpful, making the experience even more enjoyable. If you're a fan of Lego, don't miss out on this fun and vibrant park!

top_reviews.title: Excellent kids attraction
top_reviews.review: Excellent place for young kids. Itâs fun for families as well. The location is slightly away from Central Dubai hence you need to plan your day accordingly. Take only one ticket per day to enjoy the rides. Combined tickets for two attractions in one day will be a waste.

top_reviews.title: Best Ticket Advice from Fatima Mohammed
top_reviews.review: It was funny how we ended up in Legoland.. we were heading to Motiongate. The taxi dropped us to Legoland gate turns out they both are in the same area, not a knowledge I knew of. So I was lost what to do and decide between both .. the ticket officer Fatima Mohammed made my decision easier and was so grateful. She told me about the hopper ticket and plus a GCC discount, that I may gain from downloading an app etc.. ticket price became more affordable and less than a 100 drhams Addition to the 1 day leagoland ticket pass. So grateful to her and a very successful experiment for me and my kid. Plus had time to do both parks since our time was not a peak season.

top_reviews.title: Legoland Christmas and Snow
top_reviews.review: Once again, Totally Awesome. Christmas is here and the tree is up together with snow in the desert. Ate as usual at Caesars Pasta where the staff are so lovely with children. In particular Shaz and Lily who despite the thousands that visit, have made a point to remember childrenâs names. Our son Zach loves the restaurant not just because of the delicious pizza but the two ladies that remember his name. Hats off to Bolaji who as one of the management team, has provided our son with high fives whenever seen Fantastic park!! Quite simply you have to visit.

top_reviews.title: Great day out
top_reviews.review: I had read the reviews before coming so didnât have high expectations but we had a wonderful time. We had 4 kids between 5 and 11 and they all had something to keep them busy. We spent a few hours the first night then a good 5 hours the next day (we had unlimited entries to the parks over three days). Queues were non-existent so we were able to go on the good rides many times and the kids had an awesome time. Fun day out!

top_reviews.title: Amazingly Great as long as you are not on the short end !
top_reviews.review: LegoLand was so fun! We had an amazing time, the rides are all kid friendly. My only issue with the entire thing is that the height limit for rides tends to be 90cm. I would advise you measure your kid in advance before going specifically for the kid in question to Motiongate and LegoLand. I would say the kids should be approximately 3 years or so to enjoy the theme park. Nontheless there are other options for the smaller ones(not as many) and fun for the kids and adults. The attention to detail is astounding! There is a mini world section. I love the theme, there is play areas for smaller ones and rides which the smaller ones can go on with parents. There are great restaurants and food stalls available. I did not stay at the hotel we stayed at Lapita which is nearby as well. We did not have many queues because we went around the 18th December but I am sure closer to Christmas would be much busier.

name: The Lost Chambers Aquarium
description: The largest Aquarium in the Middle-East and Africa! Lost for thousands of years deep beneath the sea, the ancient ruins of the lost city of Atlantis have finally been uncovered. Come live out your own Atlantean adventure at The Lost Chambers Aquarium home to 65,000 incredible marine animals. Explore the underwater mazes and tunnels of this lost civilization while encountering sharks, eels, seahorses and piranhas. There are over 20 impressive marine life exhibits including a touch tank and our interactive Aquatheatre show.

top_reviews.title: Coffee, breakfast, and sharks!
top_reviews.review: The "Ambassador Dive" is a laid-back underwater adventure for all types of divers. It's like a chill 50-minute hangout with loads of tropical fish, rays and sharks! A perfect way to kickstart your day.

top_reviews.title: Once in a lifetime, do it
top_reviews.review: It was amazing to do both the Aquatrek Xtreme followed by Dive Discovery. You are accompanied by two pro divers. I was a bit scared for the first few minutes but diver Joel was seasoned enough to sense that proceed with the full dive of ~31ft for around 27 mins before my o2 started to near low. The dive chamber is induce the Atlantis aquarium with the Atlantis theme. People can see you from the large glass walls of the aquarium! simply put once in a lifetime experience for this who want to have a taste of diving. Thanks to the Joel and the dive crew.

top_reviews.title: Exceptional
top_reviews.review: As far as aquariums go this is exceptionally clean and all the fish look happy with plenty of space. The main tank is magical. We took our time and went through some sections twice but we was done within an hour which was disappointing

top_reviews.title: Atlantis Aquarium!! must to take the fish tales tour ð
top_reviews.review: Wowww so amazing!! You need to book the fish tales tour with Dan. You get so many insides about the aquarium.. Number of animals in the tanks, food per day, team size and you can see baby sharks and heaps of jelly fishes. It is a fun tour with a huge learning effect for both kids and adults ð Again, thx to Dan!!!!

top_reviews.title: Amazing!!
top_reviews.review: We did the fish tales tour. It whorthed every minute! Charles guided us throughout the chambers and curious data about the sea life, reproduction, among other things that makes total difference during the tour. We visited the sharks, jelly fish nursery, itâs so interesting!

top_reviews.title: Interesting design
top_reviews.review: The layout is original and interesting. It makes you feel like you're in a sci-fi movie, as if you're expecting an alien to appear around the corner at any moment. Personally, I liked it more than Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo. Quite crowded. It is strange that in the description it is said that it is "the largest Aquarium in the Middle-East and Africa". It didn't seem very big to me and not bigger than Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo. You need about an hour to visit it.

top_reviews.title: A day at the lost chamber!
top_reviews.review: Den took the time to explain to us all the details about the way the aquarium operates the number of species and the process! So knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the work the team does! We were impressed with the amount of species and the cleanliness of the place!

top_reviews.title: Fish Tour
top_reviews.review: We had a very good time during our Fish Tour with Den at the Lost Chamber Aquarium. Den was full of energy and knowledge about the marine life and the fishes that resides in the aquarium. Would definitely come back again when Iâm back in Dubai.

top_reviews.title: Diving in The Lost Chambers aquarium
top_reviews.review: Signed up for diving in The Lost Chambers aquarium and it was a very pleasant and amazing experience. Full diving equipment is available and it is well taken care of. Instructor Fabian is very clear on dive plan and help us out, in case we found difficulty in the water. Overall, very very good experience except that the sharks are mostly shy with the divers

top_reviews.title: AquaTrek at Atlantis
top_reviews.review: AquaTrek was an amazing experience! Highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubai. Airen was our instructor and she was absolutely brilliant! All the staff took great care of us and are very professional. And a special thank you to Lorraine who went above and beyond! Thank you for an unforgettable experience!

name: Bla Bla Dubai
description: 21 Bars, 3 Cuisines, 1 Beach Club in one unique venue. Offering a day-to-night experience with a breathtaking view of Bluewaters and The Dubai Eye. Located at The Beach, JBR. Under 21 allowed in the restaurant only from 8am to 5pm.

top_reviews.title: A must stop if youâre visiting the Marina!
top_reviews.review: Wow! What a wonderful way to spend a day there! Pool, food and music outstanding, the service is next level like all places we went in Dubai! If your staying at the marina a mist stop!

top_reviews.title: 5â­ï¸
top_reviews.review: I was there last Friday the atmosphere was electric and the overall view was very chill , The IT place to be in Dubai .Highly recommend . The Service was amazing all thanks to Vuchko, who was very polite, hostel , and on his top tier to make sure everything was intact. 5 â­ï¸ for his service!! Very hard working

top_reviews.title: Live Music, Good Food, Choice of Beers
top_reviews.review: We were in Dubai for a weekâs break. We like taking a stroll along the Walk at JBR. We have been in Bla Bla a few times now during previous visits. This visit was good too. We didnât book. Shown to a choice of tables. Service quick for drink but had to attract attention to order food. Music no so good this time, but live music is an attraction. Food was good. Well worth a visit.

top_reviews.title: 5 star !!
top_reviews.review: I was in Bla Bla on Sat , and the music was amazing!! The food and drinks was out of this world. And the service was one of the best all thanks to Vushko , who was very kind , helpful and positive with a smile . Will definitely visit again.

top_reviews.title: Good live entertainment at Bla Bla
top_reviews.review: The service was very friendly, the entertainment by Aston Wylie was very enjoyable. He sang songs from the guests wishlist , really funny and nice . And such a good singer. And the food is good :) We discovered that there even is a club . Next visit we explore the nightclub :)

top_reviews.title: Nice beach club
top_reviews.review: Day time review - Good atmosphere, food and drinks was amazing and good service. Would recommend the sushi! Note that make sure you arrive within the 15 minute grace period or they will give away your booking.

top_reviews.title: Favorite place in Dubai
top_reviews.review: We booked the VIP table as usual and from the reception to the table was an amazing experience. They cool guy from Russia name Dima was an absolute stunner, he is the reason we booked the VVIP for Vengaboyz event. Kudos to Bla Bla Team ð

top_reviews.title: Favourite lunch spot
top_reviews.review: Bla Bla is my favourite lunch spot to go to with my mother. It was the first place to return to after our visit earlier this year. The staff here are all equally friendly and polite - shout out to Tun he is great! Of the many times weâve eaten here, each time we have left with no complaints. If you are looking for light enjoyable, good quality food with variation this is the place.

top_reviews.title: The party was fantastic, and the music was exceptional.
top_reviews.review: "Windy truly made our night party at Bla Bla Night Club unforgettable! Her exceptional handling that demonstrated professionalism and a keen eye for detail. From start to finish, Windy's energy and expertise added an extra spark to the night. Thank you for making our event a success!"

top_reviews.title: Best Night Club in Dubai
top_reviews.review: Bla Bla is one of the most elegant , casual and incredible nightclub in Dubai. The location is amazing, the staff is wonderful and regardless of the day of the week one will have a great time. The DJ, the music, the bartenders and the entire staff of Bla Bla is amazing. I would like to recognize Mr. Ivan one of the managers for his amazing job with crowd control and following up with all of the guests to make sure they have a wonderful experience. Heâs an example of what a phenomenal leader is. During my last trip in Dubai, I had the incredible experience of visiting Bla Bla on multiple days while I was in Dubai, and have been treated so amazing by the staff, and Mr. Ivan personally making sure my experience was amazing. I Highly recommend this club, to anyone that wants to party in style, casual, classy and an amazing environment in the best location in Dubai the JBR beach!!

name: At The Top, Burj Khalifa
description: Your chance to enter the record books The high point of any Khalifa experience is the view from At The Top observation deck Located on level 124 of the world's tallest tower, this observatory is destined to be the highlight of any visit to the Middle East.the journey to the top, visitors are entertained by a multi-media presentation of the exotic history of Dubai and the marvel of Burj Khalifa.
getting_there: Burj Khalifa/Dubai Mall â¢ 10 min walk

top_reviews.title: Topmost Experience
top_reviews.review: Noteworthy experience. Ultra fast elevator climb to the 125th floor. At the tallest standing free structure in the world . Lots of tourists. Getting help from our excellent tour guide was definitely a big help. Nice to see some history before the ascent, and showing appreciation to the brains and brawn behind the project , by presenting several galleries. Photo Ops galore.

top_reviews.title: Sunrise Experience for the Wallet
top_reviews.review: Going up the Burj Khalifa can be pricey depending on the date and time so the Sunrise + Morning Treat Package was something we chose to save some money. To get to the At the Top area we went to the Fashion Avenue entrance by Cartier at Dubai Mall. The security will open doors for Dubai Mall before 5:30 am and our entrance opened around 5:15 am but we saw people who had gotten up there earlier. Getting here early meant we got an elevator all to ourselves but if we had to wait there were enough things to look at and read in an exhibition hall before the elevator. The Sunrise experience only gets you access to the 124rth floor but there's a nice terrace and we got a pretty good sunrise. You can stay here as long as you want and many people were camping out in the window frames for the viewing spots. Outside of the terrace there's not much - there is a gift shop, a cafe, bathrooms and some TVs displaying facts and statistics about the Burj Khalifa. The gift shop is underwhelming and the cafe was closed while we were up there. There are other ticket packages but they can get expensive so do your research and choose what you'd like. The queue to get down wasn't managed well and people were crowding the elevators that go up and down. We felt they could have used a couple of staff to let people know where to wait to go down so that people could disembark the elevators more easily and the area didn't get too crowded. We felt people were pushy to get in the elevators so we had to wait a bit even though we were one of the first to get line up to go down. The treat at the cafe was nice and you had a choice between several hot and cold beverages including coffee, tea, hot chocolate and juice with many options for each. The treat also included a pastry and we had cheese puffs, chicken puffs and some sort of cheese/chicken pie to choose from. A big perk for us getting here so early was that we got unobstructed pictures near the Dubai Fountains of the Burj Khalifa after we came down and they were perfect. It does not matter which ticket package you buy but it is recommended to purchase in advance. At the Top is located in Dubai Mall near a food court and the signage is very helpful to lead the way. To get here you could use the Burj Khalifa/Dubai Mall metro station which is about a 15-20 minute walk but it is covered and air conditioned.

top_reviews.title: We are AT THE TOP
top_reviews.review: The view from the top of Burj Khalifa is breathtaking, offering beautiful panorama of the city. Understanding construction journey (year wise) adds depth to the experience & providing a closer look at its incredible engineering. Consider opening additional floors to the public, especially with the 124th floor ticket prices, to reduce queues & improve the overall experience. âªï¸Purchase your entry tickets online beforehand. âªï¸Arrive at the site an hour before your selected time (expect long queues) âªï¸Single time see spot only [as a chance to witness the worldâs tallest building]

top_reviews.title: Breathtaking view
top_reviews.review: I went to Burj Khalifa on 11th of March 2024. This is a must visit attraction if you come to Dubai. The view is simply amazing. One of the best experiences. Please visit the attraction as early as possible, then it wonât be much crowded and you can take beautiful pictures.

top_reviews.title: Sylwester
top_reviews.review: Great experience! First and foremost, big thanks for the kind and professional service provided by Ms. Reem B. The experience itself was fantastic! I highly recommend everyone to visit this place!

top_reviews.title: top of the building
top_reviews.review: the building itâs self was incredible, the view is amazing at the top and all around, the way the building lights up is incredible. watching the water show from the top was a great experience. 10/10 recommend coming here for the experience

top_reviews.title: Thank You Heidy Gonzales
top_reviews.review: My visit to Burj Khalifa was made extraordinary thanks to the impeccable service provided by Gonzalez Agency. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and personalized approach ensured a memorable experience. The team's knowledge and passion enhanced my visit, making it seamless and truly enjoyable. I highly recommend Gonzalez Agency for anyone looking to experience Burj Khalifa at its best.

top_reviews.title: Thank You Heidy Gonzalezs !â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
top_reviews.review: My journey to Burj Khalifa turned into an exceptional adventure, all thanks to the top-notch service delivered by the Gonzalez Agency. Their professionalism, meticulous attention to every detail, and tailored service guaranteed an unforgettable visit. The expertise and enthusiasm of the team elevated my experience, ensuring a smooth and delightful visit. For an unparalleled experience of Burj Khalifa, choosing Gonzalez Agency is a must. Highly recommended!

top_reviews.title: Beatiful
top_reviews.review: Thank you for being here. The building is amazing. Nice plaza, beautiful szopd everywhere. We want to come back again. Everything perfect. Amazing customer service with good people.

top_reviews.title: Exceptional experience and great host Tatiana Veiga
top_reviews.review: The experience at At The Top was exceptional. The view from the lounge on the 148th floor of the Burj Khalifa is priceless. The entire lounge staff was extremely friendly and helpful. They are offering refreshing drinks and food all the time. Special praise of course goes to the host ambassador Tatiana Veiga who was extremely friendly and very professional in her work. We will not forget her hospitality. Highly recommend!

name: Dubai Festival City Mall
description: Dubai Festival City Mall is a shopping mall in Dubai Festival City, on Dubai Creek in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE). Originally opened in 2007, but expanded in 2017.â Overlooking the serene waters of the creek and iconic Dubai Skyline, Festival City Mall holds a special place in the heart of North Dubai.â Accessible to shoppers via multiple roadways, public transport and special water taxi stops on the iconic Dubai Creek.â The mall Festival Bay a great outdoor and used for daily nighttime "IMAGINE Show" Laser, Lights and Fountain show. There is an Abra boat service across Dubai Creek between the Dubai Festival City Mall and the Al Jaddaf Marine Station, close to the Dubai Creek metro station on the green Line of the Dubai Metro. This is operated by the Dubai Roads and Transport Authority (RTA). With over 400 stores and more than 100 Restaurants and Cafes, Food Court with 1000 Seat the largest in Dubai.

top_reviews.title: Dubai festival city
top_reviews.review: I really love this place! I try to come every time I come. An exceptionally pleasant holiday atmosphere fills this shopping center, there are no crowds of tourists here, as in the Dubai Mall. You can combine business with pleasure â most brands are represented in shopping galleries. But the most enticing for me is the embankment with fountains, laser and fire Show! I recommend you to visit. Be sure to go to the Rasasi and Desigual store!

top_reviews.title: Very nice place
top_reviews.review: A large and quite beautiful mall. Dozens of shops (or hundreds...), a food court area with a rich offer, playgrounds for children, a Lulu supermarket. It is interesting that here you can take a cruise on Dubai creek, with a traditional boat. Also, one thing worth coming here for is Imagine, an impressive show of water, fire, lights and lasers.

top_reviews.title: Festive enough to be called festival mall
top_reviews.review: the fountain display at the festival mall was awesome. Colourful with a laser display, fire n sounds from the fountain made it for a thrilling displays . The Christmas displays n entertainment on the outside of the festival mall where the fountains are the made me feel like a child again. To me, the festive mall outweighed the Dubai n Emirates Malls. The mall was more normal n family orientated. I suppose since it's not rated as touristy, no hype about it.

top_reviews.title: A nice mix of shops and restaurants
top_reviews.review: Weâve been to most Dubai malls over the years and the bigger ones tend to have only high end stores. If you get the chance try Dubai Festival City Mall. Itâs a good size, less touristy with a variety of shops and great food court too. To add to the adventure get the Metro to Creek station, outside go straight across down a little path for a few minutes to get the water taxi across the Creek to the Festival City mall ð

top_reviews.title: Impressive mall
top_reviews.review: This is a large and well stocked mall with a great location. The outside area offers a great view to downtown Dubai and daily fountain show. Inside is a wide range of shops and excellent food and beverage outlets. There is also a large Carrefour and IKEA, together with lots of entertainment options. The mall is easily accessible by car and there is plenty of parking.

name: The Dubai Fountain
description: Choreographed to music, the Dubai Fountain shoots water as high as 500 feet âthatâs as high as a 50-story building. Designed by creators of the Fountains of Bellagio in Vegas, Dubai Fountain Performances occur daily on the 30-acre Burj Khalifa Lake.

top_reviews.title: Great day and night time viewing
top_reviews.review: This is a must see and especially at night wit the water display and the Burj Khalifa light show. Its a good walk around and plenty of restaurants and eateries on most sides. We saw it during the daytime and from a restaurant at night. The light and water display is every half hour and each one is done to a different style and music.

top_reviews.title: Dubai Downtown
top_reviews.review: I had a dinner with my fellow delegates at ABD EL WAHAB RESTAURANT a lebanese cuisine and it was a great experience. just right outside you can see the dancing fountains at night come to life, right behind it is the burj khalifa shining and full of lights. It was a dream came into reality

top_reviews.title: Fabulous show
top_reviews.review: This is something not to be missed. It happens every half hour on the hour and at half past but you need to take up your position a lot earlier as it gets very crowded. Itâs a spectacular show where the sprinklers and jets dance to the music sending the water in choreographed directions along with loud firecracker sounds. The Burj Khalifa stands in the background and lights up in numerous colours and effects that add to the memorable experience

top_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
top_reviews.review: Saw the show from beside the lake the first time but it was so crowded you could only see the tall fountains and the colours on the Burj but then we went for dinner at Joe's with a terrace table and saw it twice more and it was brilliant. Each time was different and to different music, both classic and modern. Lot like Vegas but the Burj being lit up adds to it.

top_reviews.title: Must see
top_reviews.review: This was so beautiful to watch! Caught the daytime show while at the mall. It was so hot outside but that didn't matter to me. I had to watch the whole show. I imagine that the boat ride on the fountains at night would have been even more beautiful. This was my most favorite experience in Dubai.

top_reviews.title: Very nice , hopefully this review is different
top_reviews.review: 10/10 donât really need me to tell you how great this place is however what I can tell you that is. Free view , anywhere around the fountain stood up. Cheap fantastic view , somewhere like 5 guys or Pizza Hut or vapianos Medium price but best view huqqa 2nd floor mall . You canât see the burj but can see a better view of the fountain . Drinks start from about Â£4/5 to Â£10/15

top_reviews.title: DUBAI FOUNTAIN AT DAY AND NIGHT
top_reviews.review: Dubai Fountain is one of the best tourist attraction that Iâve always see in my social media platform. I was amazed to its majestic and perfect place to take a picture with Burj Khalifa. Even at night, the water fountain show is highly recommended to watch and visit. Iâll comeback here soon!

top_reviews.title: Very nice
top_reviews.review: very nice to see a the variety of cultures sharing together this unforgettable experience. My wife and I love to visit this place at least once a month to feel the vibe irradiated by this espectacular place. We always enjoy seeing the fountain performances which are very diversified.

top_reviews.title: Amazing
top_reviews.review: Very, very beautiful show of fountains, in perfect harmony with music. Every 30min another show (starting with 6pm, I think...). Probably in future will be colored light of jets (as in Bucharest). Is an infinite pleasure to stay on terasse at Souk Al Bahir and see fountains and Burj Kalifa...

top_reviews.title: Great Display of Sights and Sounds
top_reviews.review: Be there by 5:30 pm for good vantage points. By 6 pm the show starts. Not that lengthy display but it is nice enough not to drag. Goes on 30 minute interval. Reminds one of those in Las Vegas and Macau.

name: City Walk
description: City Walk is a design-inspired open-air lifestyle destination in Dubai that spans an area of more than 10 million square feet. Nestled in a prestigious neighbourhood on Al Safa Street in close proximity to the arterial Sheikh Zayed Road and the sophisticated Jumeirah Street, the family-friendly hub seamlessly combines living, retail, F&B, entertainment, hospitality and wellness options within one integrated space to offer visitors a unique sense of community and comfort. Designed to evolve as a city within a city, City Walk has emerged as the preferred choice for residents and tourists looking for a sophisticated place to shop, dine, socialize and spend quality time in a serene ambience in the heart of Dubai. City Walk is home to Canadian University Dubai and will soon have Talabatâs 150,000 sq ft HQ that will be split across two separate buildings, with the first set of employees expected to be moved in by Q3 2022.

name: The Dubai Mall
description: This downtown mall is known for luxury stores like Cartier and Harry Winston. It also has an aquarium, ice rink, and 360-degree views of the city from the worldâs tallest building, The Burj Khalifa.

top_reviews.title: Didn't have time to do it justice
top_reviews.review: If you use public transfer to get to it and get off at Burj Khalifa/Dubai Mall metro stop you should be aware that the station is about 10-15 walk away from the actual Mall itself but the walk way is under cover and air conditioned. We spent several hours there but my wife and daughters didn't think we had time to do it justice. There is a whole floor of eateries and the shops go from the expected "very high end very expensive" to H&M. It contains a massive aquarium which has a huge transparent wall you can look into and there is the free Fountain Show from about 6:30 in the evening so you might want to go in the afternoon. I suppose there is slight surreal/excess feel to the place but you should go and see it.

top_reviews.title: Great Mall to visit.
top_reviews.review: This mall has more open space than the Mall of Emirates and some different shops. Lots of eateries to choose from and also this mall is the access to the Burl Khalifa. On the far side is access to the Dubai fountain. Also this mall has an indoor Aquarium and ice skating rink. Very impressive to see.

top_reviews.title: Fantastic mall
top_reviews.review: You don't have to like shopping to enjoy this mall. So much lovely detail inside and incredible shops amd eateries to wonder around. Great access out to see the Burj and Fountains therefore it's a fantastic area to spend some time. You'll find the mall's air conditioning lovely on the hottest of days!

top_reviews.title: Epically big
top_reviews.review: To an average person you must be blow away by the size of the space, just when you think you have clear the floor you glance and see another section. Everything is supersized, posh shops, restaurants and cafeterias everywhere. You choose well time when you come here and accept fact that unless you spend days here, you will be unable to see all. Taking taxi is a nightmare, you may end up waiting hour or two.

top_reviews.title: A gem!
top_reviews.review: Breathtaking mall! Everything was easy , from parking to finding our way around! Having been to various global malls..this mall gets full marks! From its architectural design to its array of shops ...the experience of just being there is overwhelming! Every shop is kitted out elegantly from local to western brands. The magnitude of size will take one, more than a day to explore all shops. There's a food court ; a kids' play area. Unlike other malls here it's the space that spreads out the crowds ...hence one doesn't get the elbow jostling space invasion experience. Dubai Mall is itself a unique experience; for any visitor..it has earned its name & grandeur reputation.

top_reviews.title: A Shopping Mall with an ice rink! Only in Dubai
top_reviews.review: This is the biggest shopping mall you will ever experience. It is so amazing, with every designer shop you can think off. We event went to the underwater zoo, which is also an amazing experience, and seeing live crocodiles! Dubai is just out there and offers quality and friendly people. We even came across an ice rink! The Mall is massive and you need to spend a whole day there to take it all in. Food Halls are superb, so much choice, and not that expensive. The Fountains outside of a night time is a must and get on a boat taxi for only Â£16 and see the fountains up close. A truly memorable experience and will be back.

top_reviews.title: Dubai Mall !!
top_reviews.review: A fun evening out. We started at The Frame then took a short taxi ride to Dubai Mall. Where else could you see the words tallest building, a fountain light show, a waterfall inside the mall, an aquarium inside the mall and endless shops of all kinds all within a short(ish) distance.

top_reviews.title: Probably one of the best in the world
top_reviews.review: With its huge spacious dimensions, the intimidating number of brands from basic to the ultra luxurious. Being connected to the worlds tallest free standing structure. Having the extreme of cuisines from fast food to must try fine dining. Having a high end aquarium . Looking out to a lovely fountain display at evening. It caters for every choice. Be wary however of the volume of people going in and out of the mall , particularly during peak hours.

top_reviews.title: A must
top_reviews.review: It is NOT just another mall! While you will recognize almost all of the shops, the attractions, design and architecture will enthrall you. We found that going from attraction to attraction (aquarium, divers waterfall, ice rink, the souk, Burj Khalifa, Dubai Fountain) brought us close enough by so many retail shops we were happy with what we'd seen / shopped. The mall is HUGE and the directional signage not always helpful. We arrived at 1pm, walked around, made out appointment at the BK, had dinner, saw the fountain show and then gelato before finally leaving about 930pm. Crazy amount of people around the time of the fountain shows, but crowds rapidly disperse around the mall. More luxurious than the other mall (with the ski slope) not too far away.

top_reviews.title: Easily Spent too much time here
top_reviews.review: We didn't want to spend too much time here but found ourselves here almost everyday during our trip to Dubai. There is a lot to see and some very nice shops and restaurants. The Dubai Mall is part of the great Downtown Dubai area and is connected to the Burj Khalifa and offers a variety of terraces to view the Dubai Fountains and Burj area. We did quite a bit of window shopping and buying here as there are a lot of brands from all over the world and we felt we got some good deals on some new clothes, shoes and other items too. When we went in November there was lots of Christmas items and displays that we appreciated. The best part about this mall is how clean and well maintained it is. There are a lot of different themed areas and the mall itself is nicely organized to have similar shops in the same area. For example there is an area called Fashion Avenue which has more of the upscale fashion brands, a Souq area with Arabic style shops, there is Chinatown which has restaurants and stores catered to Chinese, a sports area, children's clothes area, etc. There are many attractions in the mall too like an ice skating rink, a giant aquarium and indoor art installations. There are also quite a few domed areas and nicely decorated walls that look great in pictures. The At the Top experience for Burj Khalifa can also be accessed from inside the Dubai Mall. The mall is connected to the Dubai Metro at Burj Khalifa/Dubai Mall station via a long pedway system which takes about 15 minutes to get to. The mall is truly overwhelming and worth spending a few hours at to just look around if you enjoy malls. There is also a Dubai Mall application that can help navigate the mall to find specific stores or attractions. The application stopped working a few times for us but we found closing and opening it up again helped us. We found ourselves coming back again and again to either try a different experience or restaurant.

name: Dubai Creek Golf & Yacht Club
description: Golf course in Dubai with distinctive sail-like clubhouse architecture.
